text:
The archipelago big-eyed tree frog ("Nyctimystes perimetri") is a tree frog from Papua New Guinea. It lives on islands in the Louisade Archipelago. It lives in forests and wetlands not near the ocean.
The adult male frog is about 5.1 cm long and the female 6.7 cm long. The dead, preserved frog is dark gray. There is some yellow on the throat.
